proposal: Understanding the importance of patient care, healthcare security, and data transparency, Medifakt is revolutionizing the industry with its decentralized blockchain platform. With 606 holders in the ETH network, congratulations on building a strong community! If you're looking to further engage your community, why not let them deploy their own DEX or host a blockchain-based lottery? Our tools are designed to align with your vision, empowering your community to contribute directly to your ecosystem.
